structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Effect of adoption of KRS 95.761 to 95.784 on other statutes.
law.text: When the provisions of KRS 95.761 to 95.784 have been accepted and adopted by the legislative body of any city, KRS 95.710 and 95.760 shall not apply to that city.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 145, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 27

metadata.lrc-note: (1982). A technical correction has been made in this section by the Reviser of Statutes pursuant to KRS 7.136.
